author: Omkar Godbole
title: Bitcoin Profit Taking Accelerates as BTC Realized Gain Jumps to $2.4B
description: Long-term holders have been selling their BTC as U.S.-listed spot bitcoin ETFs see continued inflows.
content:
The profit-taking activity on the Bitcoin network intensified on Monday, keeping bitcoin's 
 spot price under pressure on the final day of the second quarter.The total amount of realized profits on-… [+919 chars]
